import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Icon } from "@iconify/react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import SidebarNames from "./SidebarNames"; import { getUserRole, logout } from "../../utils/auth"; const Sidebars = ({ children }) => { const [sidebarActive, setSidebarActive] = useState(false); const [mobileMenu, setMobileMenu] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const userRole = getUserRole(); const isSuperAdmin = userRole === 'superadmin'; const toggleSidebar = () => setSidebarActive(!sidebarActive); const toggleMobileMenu = () => setMobileMenu(!mobileMenu); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; const getDashboardLink = () => { return isSuperAdmin ? '/super-admin' : '/dashboard'; }; let sidebarControl = () => { setSidebarActive(!sidebarActive); }; let mobileMenuControl = () => { setMobileMenu(!mobileMenu); }; return (
